jobTitle: Software Engineer Intern with Westlake Financial Services
jobDescription: The position listed below is not with LA Interviews but with Westlake Financial Services  LA Interviews is a private organization that works in collaboration with government agencies to promote emerging careers. Westlake Financial Services, the largest privately held finance company in the Nation, is looking for Software Developer Interns to join our Technology team. Skilled at multitasking  Comfortable working in a high pressure environment  Knowledge and experience in Linux, Perl, Shell scripting, awk and sed a Plus EDUCATION: Currently pursuing a Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related technical field.
